text: Ani (tyancyasathi) je tyancyanantara ale, je mhanatila ki, he amacya palanakartya! Amhala mapha kara ani amacya tya bandhavannahi, jyanni amacya adhi imana rakhale ahe ani imana rakhanaryancyavisayi amacya manata kapata (ani vairabhavana) anu nako. He amacya palanakartya! Nihsansaya, tu prema ani daya karanara ahe
